author: larde.victor
title: Contributionism worldwide
description: Local Communities should be abundant of all resources. Capitalism doesn't offer this for all, or we should have no misery anymore already.
solution: Contributionism, with it's implementation plan One Small Town, need Cardano ecosystem to thrive. The OST are a pool of new users for Cardano
experience: Researcher - Scientist - Author - Activist - Humanitarian. Senior Financial Planner. Coach in blockchain & cryptocurrency. Business Planner.
